name: promptcloud_amazon-mobile-phone-reviews
title: Amazon Mobile Phone Reviews
description:
# Context

 [PromptCloud](https://promptcloud.com/ "PromptCloud") extracted more than 400 thousand reviews of unlocked mobile phones sold on Amazon.com to find out insights with respect to reviews, ratings, price and their relationships.
 
 # Data
 
 Following fields are available in this dataset:
 
 * Product Title
 * Brand
 * Price
 * Rating
 * Review text
 * Number of people who found the review helpful
 
 _Data was extracted in December, 2016 from the unlocked mobile category of Amazon.com._
